com.microsoft.azure.credentials

Class AzureCliCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.rest.credentials.TokenCredentials
      • com.microsoft.azure.credentials.AzureTokenCredentials
        • com.microsoft.azure.credentials.AzureCliCredentials
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceClientCredentials

    @Beta
public final class AzureCliCredentials
extends AzureTokenCredentials
    Token based credentials for use with a REST Service Client.
